profile.en:
A hacker of Veritas, Millennium Science School's infamous hacking group.

Wiretapping is her specialty, and she takes great pleasure in eavesdropping on other people's private conversations. A socially awkward young lady who addresses even younger students with formal deference. In real life, she's mousy and shy, but on the internet she's a surprisingly glib wordsmith.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、ハッカー集団「ヴェリタス」のハッカー。

特技は盗聴、他人の秘密話を盗み聞きすることを好むちょっと変わった少女。対人関係は苦手な方で、基本的に歳下の1年生にもつい敬語を使ってしまうタイプ。現実では内気で口数の少ない子だが、ネット上では非常によくしゃべる。
profile.thai:
A hacker of Veritas, Millennium Science School's infamous hacking group.

Wiretapping is her specialty, and she takes great pleasure in eavesdropping on other people's private conversations. A socially awkward young lady who addresses even younger students with formal deference. In real life, she's mousy and shy, but on the internet she's a surprisingly glib wordsmith.
profile.ko:
A hacker of Veritas, Millennium Science School's infamous hacking group.

Wiretapping is her specialty, and she takes great pleasure in eavesdropping on other people's private conversations. A socially awkward young lady who addresses even younger students with formal deference. In real life, she's mousy and shy, but on the internet she's a surprisingly glib wordsmith.
profile.zh_tw:
千年科學學園所屬，駭客集團「貝里塔斯」的駭客。

專長是竊聽，是個喜歡偷聽別人私密談話的、有點怪異的少女。
不太擅長人際關係，是對年紀較小的1年級學生也會用敬語的類型。
雖然在現實生活中是內向且沉默寡言的少女，在網路上卻非常會聊。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年学园的骇客集团真理部的骇客。

专长是窃听，喜欢偷听别人的私密谈话。
不太擅长人际关系，对1年级也说敬语，很怕和人打交道。
在现实生活中，她是胆小、沉默寡言的少女；在网路世界中，她伶牙俐齿的功力却会吓死人。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年学园的骇客集团真理部的骇客。

专长是窃听，喜欢偷听别人的私密谈话。
不太擅长人际关系，对1年级也说敬语，很怕和人打交道。
在现实生活中，她是胆小、沉默寡言的少女；在网路世界中，她伶牙俐齿的功力却会吓死人。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.thai: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.ko: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部為了解讀暗號閱覽<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>諮詢。真紀回答說，如果想解讀暗號，需要有被學生會扣押的駭客工具<鏡子>。一行人為了拿回<鏡子>，便前往由女僕部看守的學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<贝里塔斯>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuinity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuinity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.thai: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuinity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.ko: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuinity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先為大家帶來了壞消息：桃井的遊戲存檔不可恢復，桃井聽到立刻哭了起來。不過，真紀通過分析文件元數據，確認了文件的真實性，但卻無法破解密碼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 贝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.thai: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.ko: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.zh_tw: 真紀認為，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密碼，應該還能行得通。然而一款正是照此設計的工具“鏡子”卻被學生會沒收。因為是部長製作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算將其取回——這與開發部眾人不謀而合，於是他們便提出要突襲千年學生會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Yuuka got the intel of Game Development Department planning to raid Seminar with Veritas, and so she asked assistance from Akane of C&C.

desc.zh_tw: 優香知悉了遊戲開發部要聯合貝里塔斯突襲千年學生會的事情，於是向C&C的朱音請求援助。

desc.en: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Confiscated Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she know some intel about C&C.
desc.jp: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Confiscated Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she know some intel about C&C.
desc.thai: Maki explained the current situation to GDD: the Mirror was stored at the Confiscated Room of Seminar's, where C&C is the one who guards it. Momoi immediately decided to retreat, but Kotama said that she know some intel about C&C.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀向開發部解釋了現狀：“鏡子”被保存在學生會的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C負責看守那裡。桃井聽後立刻決定撤退，但小玉突然說自己知道C&C的一些消息。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪向开发部解释了现状：“镜子”被保存在学生会的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C负责看守那里。桃井听后立刻决定撤退，但小玉突然说自己知道C&C的一些消息。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 真纪向开发部解释了现状：“镜子”被保存在学生会的“扣押品保管所”中，而C&C负责看守那里。桃井听后立刻决定撤退，但小玉突然说自己知道C&C的一些消息。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.jp: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.thai: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.ko: Kotama mentioned that, currently, the president and the real girl Neru was absent, and therefore they had a chance to head-to-head with C&C.
desc.zh_tw: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部長、戰鬥力擔當“寧瑠”暫時不在，由此他們有機會對峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“宁瑠”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“宁瑠”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 小玉提到，目前C&C的部长、战斗力担当“宁瑠”暂时不在，由此他们有机会对峙C&C。

desc.en: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.jp: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.thai: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.ko: Knowing the Neru was absent, Yuuka was shocked. Yet Akane promised her that C&C would eventually nail it.
desc.zh_tw: 優香得知寧瑠不在，大為震撼。然而朱音向她保證C&C絕對能夠辦到。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香得知宁瑠不在，大为震撼。然而朱音向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香得知宁瑠不在，大为震撼。然而朱音向她保证C&C绝对能够办到。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.thai: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.ko: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井還對是否參與有所顧忌，但綠已經決定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保護這一切。愛麗絲從玩過的四十多款RPG中得出結論，冒險路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，並希望老師能夠去找工程師部一起行動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。

desc.en: Momoi asked when would it start, and was replied with "We've already started." by Hare.

desc.ko: Momoi asked when would it start, and was replied with "We've already started." by Hare.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井詢問何時開始，而晴表示“計劃早已開始”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井询问何时开始，而晴表示“计划早已开始”。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井询问何时开始，而晴表示“计划早已开始”。

desc.en: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.jp: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.thai: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.ko: Akane was curious about the source of the intel, and Yuuka replied to her with a catty smile: Himari, the president of Veritas, told her directly.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音好奇優香從何得知的消息，優香則狡猾地笑著表示，是貝里塔斯的部長陽葵告訴她的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音好奇优香从何得知的消息，优香则狡猾地笑着表示，是贝里塔斯的部长阳葵告诉她的。

desc.en: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.jp: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.thai: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.ko: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.zh_tw: 在愛麗絲和貝里塔斯成員進行佯攻作戰的時候,綠、桃井 和老師一起嘗試正面突破研討會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在爱丽丝和贝里塔斯成员进行佯攻作战的时候,绿、桃井 和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在爱丽丝和贝里塔斯成员进行佯攻作战的时候,绿、桃井 和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在爱丽丝和贝里塔斯成员进行佯攻作战的时候,绿、桃井 和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.thai: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.ko: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲充當強行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。朱音表示了對愛麗絲的喜歡。優香突然意識到其中的陷阱，囑咐下屬更換安保系統時避開由工程師部研發的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。朱音表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程师部研发的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。朱音表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程师部研发的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。朱音表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程师部研发的。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝被关起来了，计划按正常进行。工程师部方面也表示准备好了。

desc.en: Yuuka and Akane found out the Game Development Department through the surveillance cameras, and Akane was off to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and Akane found out the Game Development Department through the surveillance cameras, and Akane was off to engage.
desc.thai: Yuuka and Akane found out the Game Development Department through the surveillance cameras, and Akane was off to engage.
desc.ko: Yuuka and Akane found out the Game Development Department through the surveillance cameras, and Akane was off to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 優香和朱音從監控室中發現了遊戲開發部等人的踪跡，朱音開始應敵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香和朱音从监控室中发现了游戏开发部等人的踪迹，朱音开始应敌。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Confiscated Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Confiscated Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.
desc.thai: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Confiscated Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.
desc.ko: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Confiscated Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to start hacking.
desc.zh_tw: 兩小時前的作戰會議中，晴提到到達保管所的地方唯有通過電梯到達，然而電梯和頂樓各區域的門只能通過指紋驗證，且驗證失敗還會觸發多種機關。為了突破安全系統，響提出用EMP手雷癱瘓所有系統，到時貝里塔斯即可開始駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。

desc.en: Akane thought herself meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.jp: Akane thought herself meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.thai: Akane thought herself meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.ko: Akane thought herself meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音以為碰見了桃井和綠，實際上卻是工程師部的真紀與亞都梨。朱音向優香請求確認監控狀態，這時大家才意識到監控已被駭入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。

name.en: Let's Go To The Top Floor!
name.jp: Let's Go To The Top Floor!
name.thai: Let's Go To The Top Floor!
name.ko: Let's Go To The Top Floor!

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.
desc.thai: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka realized the trap set by Aris too late. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they were met with other Seminar members.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠到達了電梯前，與此同時朱音等人卻因指紋不符而被一同關了起來。這時優香才意識到愛麗絲的問題，而桃井、綠與老師三人已經到達頂樓，並順利用指紋開鎖，但還是遇到了學生會成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.jp: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.thai: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.ko: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.zh_tw: 閘門雖無法打開，也聯繫不上明日奈，但這時朱音收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凜確認，遊戲開發部成員已進入射擊範圍。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时朱音收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，游戏开发部成员已进入射击范围。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时朱音收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，游戏开发部成员已进入射击范围。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时朱音收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，游戏开发部成员已进入射击范围。
